content: We have a questionnaire and are implementing multi-lingual support. The response object for each question has the 'text' attribute which the spec defines as containing "Name for group or question text". We have been putting in the prompt that the user sees as they are filling out the questionnaire so for the name of the city in the english version it contains: 'City'. My question is should we be populating this with the other language's equivalent, in this case for Spanish 'Ciudad'?
It should, ideally, be populated with the text the user saw. However, that's not a requirement.
